name: Surface Runner
description:
The player plays as an AI experiencing sentience for the first time and all of the emotions that come with that. The player will progress through three different levels gaining more and more sentience.

-narrative driven-platformer
-team of 4 college students making it in 4 months
-Created all in Unreal
-puzzle solving and parkour gameplay accompany the story
-Controller recommended for gameplay (use mouse and keyboard for menus)
-Playtime is 15min- 1 hour+

Controls-
Mouse and Keyboard-
Mouse= Look around
Space= Jump/ jump off wall
WASD= Move
Shift= Wall Run Mode
E= Interact
S= Jump backwards from ledge
V= Toggle Target Visibility Crosshair
F= Teleport

Controller-
Left Stick= Look around
A= Jump/ jump off wall
Right Stick= Move
R2= Wall Run Mode
X= Interact
Down on D-pad= Jump backwards from ledge
Y= Toggle Target Visibility Crosshair
B= Teleport
